message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it could greatly benefit your business. Given its value, I propose a price of $11500 for this product.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm looking to save some money and make a profit with this product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I'd like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I propose a price of $10800 for the product.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $10000?
